name: International Conference on COPD and Asthma (Hybrid Event)
content: Magnus Group cordially invites you to join our Hybrid Event International Conference on COPD and Asthma (COPD 2021) during September 22-23, 2021 around the Theme: “Exchange questions, answers, and best practices in the field of COPD and Asthma”. In this mode participants can join the event In Paris or can also join virtually from their home or work place. COPD 2021Conference takes an opportunity to honor top researchers for delivering their innovative ideas. Its main aim is to improve in understanding and prevention. The key strategic objective of this conference is to conduct research within its areas of expertise. Renowned speakers from all over the globe are welcomed to talk and also discuss about the latest updates and new techniques involved in COPD. COPD 2021 Conference welcomes Professor, Deans, Pulmonologists, Respiratory Therapists and researchers in Pulmonology, Delegates and healthcare industries to participate in the interactive scientific-sessions, meetings. International Conference on COPD and Asthma will focus on promoting awareness and help in tackling the chronic pulmonary disorders and diseases and asthma faced by mankind.
